p: The seventh coronavirus known to infect humans is currently proliferating in humans at an alarming rate. The latest virus named SARS-CoV-2 (previously 2019-nCov) causes the disease COVID-19, a severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS). Following the initial outbreak in Wuhan, China in late 2019, the World Health Organization (WHO) now considers SARS-CoV-2 a pandemic human viral infection.
